channel.title: UserVoice (feedback app) type apps built by bootstrappers?
channel.description:
Hey,
Any of you here built a UserVoice type app or know of someone who has? I mean UserVoice the original product (idea feedback) not their help desk app. I have an idea that I'd be interested in exploring with someone who has that kinda app. As they're a help desk competitor I can't really use them :) plus their product has gotten more complicated than what I'm thinking.

item.title: UserVoice (feedback app) type apps built by bootstrappers?
item.dc:creator: kalenjordan
item.description:
I looked into uservoice alternatives for a bit. Was surprised not to really find much. Seems like there’s an opportunity there.

Read full topic
item.source: UserVoice (feedback app) type apps built by bootstrappers?
